string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: GameChanger:HandWriting Framework fully fixed. Handwriting should work in all apps without problems. SNote,Keyboard all work as intended.
Fixed weather lockscreen icon, weather predictions, edge weather in S8 ui
Added password entry in lockscreen setting
Amount of toggles on first swipe added
Data Usage Fix on both swipes (aided by @Corsicanu)
Fixed config_enableAutoPowerModes in framework to allow doze mode
Amount of rows in UX quick toggles increased to 4
Amount of toggles in expanded added
S8 keyboard ported Nougat by BlackM3sa
S8 Keyboard mod to allow secondary symbols for all languages
S8 fix to allow two left multifunction buttons
Safe music dialog disabled in rom control by @OvrDriVE
Email policy mod with toggle by @Txr33
Email rtl fix for all languages
New SBrowser v7.0 with secret mode enabled (thanks @Edzamber)
My Files with a Nougat theme (thanks @Corsicanu)
FirewallM.apk for blocking calls restored per user request
New SuperSU in Aroma with new binary
Fixed framework for cpu unsupported methods (thanks @Ale95)
Fix for round Google Search in Browser
Add icon in launcher to C9 Weather
New ported V5.0 s8 launcher by Josette (thanks to @Anan1211&@Ale95 for porting help)
Fix TouchWiz S8 to use C9 weather
Fixed incall ringing when with headphones&silent/vibrate mode
Reverted SoundAlive to old, fully working version
Remoded latest SamsungMusic&port with Lightning (thanks to @Corsicanu)
Two new devices added by 6h0st: Us Cellular&KDDI Corporation
Much more things for you to discover
Double Tap to Sleep mod added (thanks @thereassaad)
Fixed Am/Pm mod (thanks to Norma for more bugs)
Fixed AutoBrightness bug in framework (thanks TDunham)
Removed quickpin unlock Aurora bugged mod
Remoded S8 with a. Sliding toggles on top, Nougat brightness toggle on top, 6 toggles in a row (thanks Craftingmod)
Added 1st and 2nd swipe brightness in all SystemUI
Removed theme store mods - xda complience
Fixed blank space on brightness on first swipe thanks to josephpatrick
Fixed s8 clock mod thanks to Oidy
Added TUR csc thanks to Eleo
Fixed BTU default launcher home screens
Notification icons only view layout fixed
